body:
Hi,

I have been trying to compile libint2.6 for cp2k7.1. 
Attached is the out and the error log that were given out by spack.
Please help?
[error.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4562180/error.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4562182/spack-build-out.txt)
title: cp2k7.1 libint2.6 pre-req fails
